dt: {bc}to think too much about (something) {bc}to put too much time into thinking about or analyzing (something) in a way that is more harmful than helpful

dt.t: someone who {wi}overthinks{/wi} and worries too much
"I was a terrible actor when I went to New York. I was scared. I would overprepare, sometimes {wi}overthink{/wi} a role."
For a while now, I've been finding current fiction hard to read: airlessly competent, relentlessly put-together, {wi}overthought{/wi}.

utxt.t: But the problem is I'm an {wi}overthinker{/wi}. I contemplate and consider, deliberate and debate things small and large in my life. Simple things become complicated and easy decisions become complex.

shortdef: to think too much about (something) : to put too much time into thinking about or analyzing (something) in a way that is more harmful than helpful
